lyric.verse: O-i!! Ano ko no hontoo ore wa shiranai Ano ko no uso wo ore wa shiranai
Ano ko wa hitori MANGA wo yonde Warainagara nemutteshimatta
Ano ko wa kyoo mo yuugure tabi de hanbun kuuki Waratte hashidasu
O-i!! That girl, I really don't know her That girl, I don't know her lies
That girl, she reads manga by herself And she smiles when she's gone to sleep
That girl, night and day, she travels half way to the atmosphere She smiles and begins to run

translator.translatorname: Sapporo Omoide In My Head Jootai lyric sheet

lyric.verse: おーい!! あの娘の本当 オレは知らない あの娘のうそを オレはしらない
あの娘はひとり マンガを読んで 笑いながら 眠ってしまった
あの娘は 今日も 夕暮れ旅で半分空気 笑って 走り出す
